meanings.sent1: The cup was brimfull of water.
meanings.sent2: The jar was brimfull of colorful marbles.
meanings.sent3: The balloon was brimfull of air, ready to pop!
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt brimfull of joy on her birthday.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was brimfull of gold coins, gleaming in the sunlight.
